languages.text: "Версерианы — семейство, основанное сенешалем Леди Теодоры и потому номинально считающееся дворянским — по крайней мере, с точки зрения Имперского флота, из рядов которого происходит господин Абеляр. На Даргонусе, однако, их положение шатко — во-первых, им так и не был присвоен официальный титул, чему многие десятилетия препятствуют старые рода Даргонуса, во-вторых, другие семейства не считают их ровней — скорее выскочками, пользующимися приближенностью к Вольному Торговцу. Версерианы отвечают за флот мира-столицы и обеспечивают большинство перевозок грузов по внутренним маршрутам".

traits.locale_text: "Версерианы — семейство, основанное сенешалем леди Теодоры и потому номинально считающееся дворянским — по крайней мере, с точки зрения Имперского Флота, из рядов которого происходит господин Абеляр. На Даргонусе, однако, их положение шатко — во-первых, им так и не был присвоен официальный титул, чему многие десятилетия препятствуют старые рода Даргонуса, во-вторых, другие семейства не считают их ровней — скорее выскочками, пользующимися приближенностью к Вольному Торговцу. Версерианы отвечают за флот мира-столицы и обеспечивают большинство перевозок грузов по внутренним маршрутам".

languages.text: "The Werserians are a line founded by Lady Theodora's Seneschal and as such are nominally considered nobility — at least from the standpoint of the Imperial Navy, from which Lord Abelard hails. On Dargonus, however, their position is precarious — firstly, they never were granted an official title, a process which has been impeded for decades by the old houses of Dargonus, and secondly, the other families do not see them as equals, but more as upstarts clinging to the Rogue Trader's favour. The Werserians are responsible for the capital world's fleet and the majority of the cargo shipments on domestic routes."
languages.original_text: "Версерианы — семейство, основанное сенешалем Леди Теодоры и потому номинально считающееся дворянским — по крайней мере, с точки зрения Имперского флота, из рядов которого происходит господин Абеляр. Версерианы отвечают за флот мира-столицы и обеспечивают большинство перевозок грузов по внутренним маршрутам".

The Werserians are responsible for the capital world's fleet and the majority of the cargo shipments on domestic routes."

languages.text: “韦尔森家族是由西奥多拉夫人的总领所创立的家族，因此从名义上而言，可以算是贵族。至少，从帝国海军的角度来看是这样，因为阿贝拉德勋爵来自帝国海军。不过，这个家族在达戈努斯的地位并不稳固。首先，他们从未被正式授予过贵族头衔，这件事情被达戈努斯的古老贵族家族阻挠了几十年。其次，其他贵族家族并不认为韦尔森家族有权与他们平起平坐。他们将韦尔森家族视为依附行商浪人崛起的暴发户。韦尔森家族负责首都世界与境内航线绝大部分货物的运输工作。”
languages.original_text: "The Werserians are a line founded by Lady Theodora's Seneschal and as such are nominally considered nobility — at least from the standpoint of the Imperial Navy, from which Lord Abelard hails. On Dargonus, however, their position is precarious — firstly, they never were granted an official title, a process which has been impeded for decades by the old houses of Dargonus, and secondly, the other families do not see them as equals, but more as upstarts clinging to the Rogue Trader's favour. The Werserians are responsible for the capital world's fleet and the majority of the cargo shipments on domestic routes."

traits.locale_text: “韦尔森家族是由西奥多拉夫人的总领所创立的家族，因此从名义上而言，可以算是贵族。至少，从帝国海军的角度来看是这样，因为阿贝拉德勋爵来自帝国海军。不过，这个家族在达戈努斯的地位并不稳固。首先，他们从未被正式授予过贵族头衔，这件事情被达戈努斯的古老贵族家族阻挠了几十年。其次，其他贵族家族并不认为韦尔森家族有权与他们平起平坐。他们将韦尔森家族视为依附行商浪人崛起的暴发户。韦尔森家族负责首都世界与境内航线绝大部分货物的运输工作。”

languages.text: «Los Werserian son un linaje fundado por el senescal de lady Theodora y, por lo tanto, se les considera nobleza, al menos desde la perspectiva de la marina imperial, de la que proviene el propio lord Abelard. Sin embargo, en Dargonus su posición es mucho más precaria: en primer lugar no gozan de un título oficial, cuya concesión lleva siendo obstaculizada durante décadas por las casas más antiguas de Dargonus, y, en segundo lugar, las otras familias no les consideran sus iguales sino unos advenedizos que se aprovechan del favor de su Comerciante Independiente. Los Werserian son responsables de la flota del mundo capital y de la mayoría de los cargamentos en las rutas locales».
languages.original_text: "The Werserians are a line founded by Lady Theodora's Seneschal and as such are nominally considered nobility — at least from the standpoint of the Imperial Navy, from which Lord Abelard hails. On Dargonus, however, their position is precarious — firstly, they never were granted an official title, a process which has been impeded for decades by the old houses of Dargonus, and secondly, the other families do not see them as equals, but more as upstarts clinging to the Rogue Trader's favour. The Werserians are responsible for the capital world's fleet and the majority of the cargo shipments on domestic routes."

traits.locale_text: «Los Werserian son un linaje fundado por el senescal de lady Theodora y, por lo tanto, se les considera nobleza, al menos desde la perspectiva de la marina imperial, de la que proviene el propio lord Abelard. Sin embargo, en Dargonus su posición es mucho más precaria: en primer lugar no gozan de un título oficial, cuya concesión lleva siendo obstaculizada durante décadas por las casas más antiguas de Dargonus, y, en segundo lugar, las otras familias no les consideran sus iguales sino unos advenedizos que se aprovechan del favor de su Comerciante Independiente. Los Werserian son responsables de la flota del mundo capital y de la mayoría de los cargamentos en las rutas locales».

languages.text: 「ウェルザリアン一族は、シオドーラ様の家令長として取り立てられている一族で、名目上は貴族です。少なくとも、アベラルド卿の出身である、帝国海軍の立場からはそう言えるでしょう。しかしながらダルゴナスでは、ウェルザリアン家の立場は危ういものです。第一に、正式な肩書きを与えられたことがありません。ダルゴナスの古い貴族家による妨害を何十年と受け続けているのです。そして第二に、他の家はウェルザリアン家を対等と思うどころか、自由開拓者のひいきに預かる成金扱いしています。ウェルザリアン一族は首都惑星の艦隊と、国内線の貨物輸送船の大部分を預かる責任を担っています」
languages.original_text: "The Werserians are a line founded by Lady Theodora's Seneschal and as such are nominally considered nobility — at least from the standpoint of the Imperial Navy, from which Lord Abelard hails. On Dargonus, however, their position is precarious — firstly, they never were granted an official title, a process which has been impeded for decades by the old houses of Dargonus, and secondly, the other families do not see them as equals, but more as upstarts clinging to the Rogue Trader's favour. The Werserians are responsible for the capital world's fleet and the majority of the cargo shipments on domestic routes."

traits.locale_text: 「ウェルザリアン一族は、シオドーラ様の家令長として取り立てられている一族で、名目上は貴族です。少なくとも、アベラルド卿の出身である、帝国海軍の立場からはそう言えるでしょう。しかしながらダルゴナスでは、ウェルザリアン家の立場は危ういものです。第一に、正式な肩書きを与えられたことがありません。ダルゴナスの古い貴族家による妨害を何十年と受け続けているのです。そして第二に、他の家はウェルザリアン家を対等と思うどころか、自由開拓者のひいきに預かる成金扱いしています。ウェルザリアン一族は首都惑星の艦隊と、国内線の貨物輸送船の大部分を預かる責任を担っています」

languages.text: "Die Werserians sind eine Linie, die von Lady Theodoras Truchsess begründet wurde und daher nominell als Adel gilt – zumindest aus der Sicht der imperialen Kriegsflotte, aus der Lord Abelard stammt. Auf Dargonus hingegen ist ihre Position gefährdet – erstens wurde ihnen nie ein offizieller Titel gewährt, weil die alten Häuser von Dargonus diesen Prozess seit Jahrzehnten behindern, und zweitens betrachten die anderen Familien sie nicht als gleichwertig, sondern als Emporkömmlinge, die sich an die Gunst des Freihändlers klammern. Die Werserians tragen die Verantwortung für die Flotte der Hauptwelt und den Großteil der Frachtlieferungen auf den innerplanetarischen Routen."
languages.original_text: "The Werserians are a line founded by Lady Theodora's Seneschal and as such are nominally considered nobility — at least from the standpoint of the Imperial Navy, from which Lord Abelard hails. On Dargonus, however, their position is precarious — firstly, they never were granted an official title, a process which has been impeded for decades by the old houses of Dargonus, and secondly, the other families do not see them as equals, but more as upstarts clinging to the Rogue Trader's favour. The Werserians are responsible for the capital world's fleet and the majority of the cargo shipments on domestic routes."

traits.locale_text: "Die Werserians sind eine Linie, die von Lady Theodoras Truchsess begründet wurde und daher nominell als Adel gilt – zumindest aus der Sicht der imperialen Kriegsflotte, aus der Lord Abelard stammt. Auf Dargonus hingegen ist ihre Position gefährdet – erstens wurde ihnen nie ein offizieller Titel gewährt, weil die alten Häuser von Dargonus diesen Prozess seit Jahrzehnten behindern, und zweitens betrachten die anderen Familien sie nicht als gleichwertig, sondern als Emporkömmlinge, die sich an die Gunst des Freihändlers klammern. Die Werserians tragen die Verantwortung für die Flotte der Hauptwelt und den Großteil der Frachtlieferungen auf den innerplanetarischen Routen."

languages.text: « Les Werserian ont été fondés par le sénéchal de dame Théodora, et sont donc considérés comme faisant partie de la noblesse... du moins du point de vue de la Marine Impériale, dont faisait partie le seigneur Abélard. Néanmoins, leur position sur Dargonus reste précaire. Déjà pour la simple raison qu'ils n'ont jamais reçu de titre officiel, processus que les anciennes maisons de Dargonus font exprès d'entraver depuis des décennies, et ensuite parce que les autres nobles ne les considèrent pas comme des égaux, mais plutôt comme des arrivistes qui ne doivent leur statut qu'au bon vouloir {mf|d'un libre-marchand|d'une libre-marchande}. Les Werserian sont responsables de la flotte du monde-capitale et de la majorité des transports de marchandises sur les trajets domestiques. »
languages.original_text: "The Werserians are a line founded by Lady Theodora's Seneschal and as such are nominally considered nobility — at least from the standpoint of the Imperial Navy, from which Lord Abelard hails. On Dargonus, however, their position is precarious — firstly, they never were granted an official title, a process which has been impeded for decades by the old houses of Dargonus, and secondly, the other families do not see them as equals, but more as upstarts clinging to the Rogue Trader's favour. The Werserians are responsible for the capital world's fleet and the majority of the cargo shipments on domestic routes."

traits.locale_text: « Les Werserian ont été fondés par le sénéchal de dame Théodora, et sont donc considérés comme faisant partie de la noblesse... du moins du point de vue de la Marine Impériale, dont faisait partie le seigneur Abélard. Néanmoins, leur position sur Dargonus reste précaire. Déjà pour la simple raison qu'ils n'ont jamais reçu de titre officiel, processus que les anciennes maisons de Dargonus font exprès d'entraver depuis des décennies, et ensuite parce que les autres nobles ne les considèrent pas comme des égaux, mais plutôt comme des arrivistes qui ne doivent leur statut qu'au bon vouloir {mf|d'un libre-marchand|d'une la libre-marchande}. Les Werserian sont responsables de la flotte du monde capitale et de la majorité des transports de marchandises sur les trajets domestiques. »

languages.text: "Werserianlar, Leydi Theodora'nın Seneşal'i tarafından kurulan bir hane olup görünürde soylu kabul edilirler. En azından Lord Abelard'ın yükseldiği İmparatorluk Donanması tarafında bu durum böyledir. Dargonus'ta ise konumları daha belirsizdir. Öncelikle hiç resmî bir ünvana sahip olmadılar. Bu süreç, Dargonus'un eski haneleri tarafından on yıllardır sekteye uğratılıyor. İkinci olaraksa diğer aileler, onları denkleri olarak değil de Hür Tacir'in iyi niyetine yapışan sonradan görmeler olarak görüyorlar. Werserianlar, başdünyanın donanmasından ve yerel rotalardaki yük sevkiyatlarının çoğunluğundan sorumludur."
languages.original_text: "The Werserians are a line founded by Lady Theodora's Seneschal and as such are nominally considered nobility — at least from the standpoint of the Imperial Navy, from which Lord Abelard hails. On Dargonus, however, their position is precarious — firstly, they never were granted an official title, a process which has been impeded for decades by the old houses of Dargonus, and secondly, the other families do not see them as equals, but more as upstarts clinging to the Rogue Trader's favour. The Werserians are responsible for the capital world's fleet and the majority of the cargo shipments on domestic routes."

traits.locale_text: "Werserianlar, Leydi Theodora'nın Seneşali tarafından kurulan bir hanedir ve soylu biri isim olarak görülürler, en azından Lord Abelard'ın geldiği İmparatorluk Donanması'nın bakış açısından durum bu şekilde. Dargonus'ta ise konumları daha belirsizdir. Öncelikle hiç resmî bir ünvana sahip olmadılar, bu süreç Dargonus'un eski haneleri tarafından on yıllardır sekteye uğratılıyor, ikinci olarak ise diğer aileler onları denkleri olarak değil de Hür Tacir'in iyi niyetine yapışan sonradan görmeler olarak görüyorlar. Werserianlar başdünyanın donanmasından ve yerel rotalardaki yük sevkiyatlarının çoğunluğundan sorumlular."
